ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Connect time?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed that not only does it take longer to connect but it takes longer to go through all the screens they pop up at you when you are loading the game.
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed that not only does it take longer to connect but it takes
longer to go through all the screens they pop up at you when you are loading
the game. That thing that you have to click to accept is annoying, then all
those other screens. and now they've added an aditional screen that flashes
3dfx after you've selected your server. It is soo annoying. sometimes I'm in
a hurry to get back on and I don't need the hassle of putting up with all
those graphics and junk.
luv,
-Su

----- Original Message -----
From: "LAINE. Mikael (Nol)" <laine@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 20, 2001 10:35 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Connect time?


> A few servers have been running a few emergencies patches. Maybe the login
> server was laged due to folks from these servers trying to login.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> > Sent: Friday, April 20, 2001 2:47 PM
> > To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Connect time?
> >
> > Is it just me, or is it taking longer and longer to connect? I couldn't
> > even get past the login screen for 5 or 10 minutes. Kept saying that it
> > couldn't connect to login server. Never had that happen unless it was
> > down
> > for a patch (which it wasn't). Also noticed that the times when I
choose
> > my server, and going to the character screen, and the time from the
> > character screen to the game are much longer.
> >
> > I'm running a Celeron 533 w/ 185 MB ram, windows ME a cable modem, and
> > about 2GB of drive space for windows to write to. Any suggestions?
> >
> >
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
> >
> >

http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
